title: Adapt v5
description: A sample course demonstrating the capabilities of the Adapt Framework
body: Welcome to the demonstration build for version 5 of the Adapt framework.

_buttons.disabledAriaLabel: This button is disabled at the moment

_hotgrid.ariaRegion: Selectable image component. Select each item to show more information.

_chat.ariaRegion: Chat. Selecting 'Next,' loads a text conversation between two or more characters.

_tidbits.ariaRegion: This component displays text with links. Use the links to access more information.

_accordion.ariaRegion: List of expandable sections. Select each button to expand the content.

_assessmentResults.ariaRegion: Assessment results. This is a component that details your score or results from the above assessment.

_clickAndLearn.ariaRegion: This component is a select and learn type of component where we have selectable cards, after selecting on one of those card they reveal text associated with them.

_flipcard.ariaRegion: This component is a flipcard comprised of flippable cards containing display image. Select the front face image to flip to the back face of these card to display associated text.

_hotgraphic.ariaRegion: Image with selectable areas. Select each button to show more information.

_matching.ariaRegion: Matching. Select from lists and then submit.
_matching.ariaUserAnswer: The answer you chose for {{{itemText}}} was {{{userAnswer}}}

_narrative.ariaRegion: Slide show. Select the next button to progress.

_slider.ariaRegion: Slider. Respond to the question by selecting a value on the scale and then submit.
_slider.ariaCorrectAnswerRange: The correct answer is any value from {{{bottom}}} to {{{top}}}

_textinput.ariaRegion: Text input. Type your answer and then submit.

_expose.ariaRegion: Expose. A series of items with a text or image front cover that, when selected, reveals more content.

_flipper.ariaRegion: Flipper. A component displays text or an image in a series of flipping boxes. Selecting 'Next,' flips each box until all boxes are flipped and 'completed' appears.

_imagegrid.ariaRegion: This component contains images laid out in a flexible grid.

_stacklist.ariaRegion: This stacklist component presents a list of items. Select the button to access each item in turn.
_stacklist.ariaButtonLabel: Select this button to access the next item in the stacklist.

_tabs.ariaRegion: A tabbed content container. Content can be text, graphic or both.

_downloadButton.ariaRegion: Displays a  button to download a word or pdf document to your computer. Please note that this may navigate you away from the course.

_pageLevelProgress.pageLevelProgressIndicatorBar: Page progress. Use this to listen to the list of regions in this topic and whether they're completed. You can jump directly to any that are incomplete or which sound particularly interesting. {{percentageComplete}}%
_pageLevelProgress.pageLevelProgressEnd: You have reached the end of the list of page sections.

_trickle.incompleteContent: There is incomplete content above. You must complete this before you can proceed through the course.

_close.closeButton: Select here to close the window.

_nudge.plp: Click here to view your progress
_nudge.complete: Click here to return to the menu

_sidemenu.menuEnd: You have reached the end of the menu.

_boxMenu.menuEnd: You have reached the end of the menu.

_resources.title: Resources
_resources.description: View resources for this course by clicking here.

_resourcesItems.title: Vanilla Theme Swatch
_resourcesItems.description: See the swatch for the vanilla theme by clicking here.

_resourcesItems.title: Adapt Learning YouTube Channel
_resourcesItems.description: Fancy catching up on some Adapt material? Click here.

_resourcesItems.title: Adapt Project Site
_resourcesItems.description: View the project's web site by clicking here.

_resourcesItems.title: Framework chat
_resourcesItems.description: Join the framework chat room by clicking here.

_bookmarking.title: Resume?
_bookmarking.body: Would you like to resume the course from the location you were at last time?

_search.description: Type in search words and enter
